name: PHASESpatialPipeline.Flags
desc: Sound resonance options for a spatial pipeline.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes a spatial flag with the given string.

items.name: static var directPathTransmission: PHASESpatialPipeline.Flags
items.desc: A spatial property that refers to the original audio signal.

items.name: static var earlyReflections: PHASESpatialPipeline.Flags
items.desc: A spatial property that refers to the earlier echoes along the duration of sound resonance.

items.name: static var lateReverb: PHASESpatialPipeline.Flags
items.desc: A spatial property that refers to the later echoes along the duration of sound resonance.
